i1.name: Prowl
description: {{sbc|Innate - Prowl:}} Being in {{tip|brush}} grants '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|1400 range}} {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Hunt:}} Hitting {{tt|nearby|3000 range}} {{tip|monster|monsters}} or enemy champions with {{ai|Javelin Toss|Nidalee}} or {{ai|Bushwhack|Nidalee}} marks them as ''Hunted'', {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds and granting '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the same duration, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|5500 range}} ''Hunted'' target. Additionally, '''Nidalee's''' first use of {{ai|Takedown|Nidalee}} and {{ai|Pounce|Nidalee}} against ''Hunted'' targets are empowered.
The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} from ''Prowl'' and ''Hunt'' can stack, but cannot exceed {{as|30%|ms}}.
